programme.title: Crime of Love
programme.desc: The beautiful Carmela, a girl of Sicilian descent who arrived in the North with her parents, falls in love with the Milanese Nullo, a work colleague. But their relationship must come to terms with the difference in the two's views: he is of anarchist ideas while she is deeply religious.

programme.title: Take Five
programme.desc: Five unlikely thieves are faced with the opportunity of a lifetime: a multi-million dollar robbery in a bank vault. At first united to carry out the plan, the gang members, however, allow themselves to be carried away by inexperience and avarice, each of them thinking of their own gain.

programme.title: The Magnificent Texan
programme.desc: Saxon is a tough, gun-wielding saloon owner who helps Mexican peasants oppose a notorious land baron who has cruelly oppressed them.

programme.title: So Young, So Lovely, So Vicious...
programme.desc: Gloria Guida is the cheeky teenager Angela, daughter of the widower Dr. Batrucchi. When she meets her father's new companion, Irene, taken in dislike she attempts by various subterfuges to discredit her in the man's eyes. But Angela soon discovers a stain in Irene's past: lesbian tendencies and a stormy relationship with a high school teacher, leading the latter to suicide.

programme.title: Blood Brothers
programme.desc: Nicola Bellizzi returns to Naples, after spending six years in a juvenile detention centre, determined to get out of his outcast status and become a lawyer. In the neighbourhood, Gaetano, known as Core e' Fierro, is the absolute boss of the guapperia. A clash takes place between the two young men; but the behaviour of Nicola, who defends Gaetano from the commissioner Ajossa who has caught them duelling, gives rise to a deep friendship between the two. After many denials, driven by necessity, Nicola agrees to become a guappo in turn during an initiation at the secret court to which he is introduced by Core e' Fierro. Lucia, Gaetano's woman, feels attracted to Nicola, but the two repress their desire. Ajossa wants to get his hands on Gaetano and sets a trap for Lucia, inducing her to yield to him in order to save her lover, so that the latter, in order to avenge the offence, will make a mistake.

programme.title: Daitona
programme.desc: Daitona follows a thrilling journey of survival as its characters face high-speed danger and treachery.

programme.title: Boot Hill
programme.desc: Honey Fisher has become a powerful man in a small Western town. Fisher and his gang have managed, through swindling, murder, and terror, to gain leases on the important gold-yielding land in the area. Cat Stevens and Hutch Bessy join forces with circus performers and townsfolk to fight against Fisher and his henchmen.

programme.title: Smile Before Death
programme.desc: Marco, a penniless nobleman, unhappily married to the wealthy Dorothy Emerson, has a lover, Gianna. She, one day, rids him of his irritating spouse, killing her. Having automatically become the administrator of his estate - which, however, he must pass on to Nancy, Dorothy's first-born daughter, when he turns twenty - he retires to live with Gianna in a luxurious villa on the shores of a lake. Here he is joined by the pretty future heiress, whom he had never met. In order not to have to give up the enjoyment of her wealth, Gianna incites Marco to kill the girl. The man, however, ends up falling in love with her and so does Gianna.

programme.title: Play Motel
programme.desc: A secluded motel becomes the center of a web of mysteries and criminal activity.

programme.title: So Young, So Lovely, So Vicious...
programme.desc: Gloria Guida is the cheeky teenager Angela, daughter of the widower Dr. Batrucchi. When she meets her father's new companion, Irene, taken in dislike she attempts by various subterfuges to discredit her in the man's eyes. But Angela soon discovers a stain in Irene's past: lesbian tendencies and a stormy relationship with a high school teacher, leading the latter to suicide.

In the neighbourhood, Gaetano, known as Core e' Fierro, is the absolute boss of the guapperia.
